name: cat-as-trophy
description:
This game is a action packed puzzle platformer game. You play as Schrodinger's Cat and look to navigate through the dimensional science facility to retrieve your stolen trophy.

This game was made within 72 hours, by my friend Dez, and myself to challenge our game making abilities!

Enjoy!!

If you'd like to follow the dev process on this game, you can check it out on my Youtube channel here: https://www.youtube.com/c/bimzydev

You can find Dez's art portfolio here: https://www.alexanderclarkportfolio.com/
